```{r median age map}


kpt_median_age <- kpt_data_profile_18 %>%
  filter(variable == "DP05_0018")


kpt_joined <- full_join(kpt, kpt_median_age, by = "GEOID")

median_age_county <- combined_county_dp %>%
  filter(variable == "DP05_0018")

median_age_tract <- combined_tract_dp %>%
  filter(variable == "DP05_0018")

mapview(kpt_joined, popup = popupTable(kpt_joined,
                                      zcol = c("estimate",
                                               "moe",
                                               "NAME.x")))


mapview(list(median_age_county, median_age_tract, kpt_joined),
        zcol = list("estimate", "estimate", NULL),
        legend = list(FALSE, TRUE, FALSE),
        popup = list(popupTable("estimate", "moe", "NAME"),
                     popupTable("estimate", "moe", "NAME"),
                     popupTable("estimate", "moe", "NAME.x")))

```
